Verses: 1 raagel Thaan Yaakkobukkup Pillaigalaip Peraadhadhaikkandu, Than Sagodhariyinmel Poraamaikondu, Yaakkobai Nokki: Enakkup Pillai Kodum, Illaavittaal Naan Saagiren Endraal.
2 appozhudhu Yaakkobu Raagelinmel Kobankondu: Dhevanallavo Un Karppaththai Adaiththirukkiraar, Naan Dhevanaa? Endraan.
3 appozhudhu Aval: Idho, En Velaikkaariyaagiya Pilgaal Irukkiraale; Aval En Madikkup Pillaigalaip Peravum, Avalaalaagilum En Veetu Kattappadavum Avalidaththil Serum Endru Solli,
4 avanukkuth Than Velaikkaariyaagiya Pilgaalai Manaiviyaagak Koduththaal; Appadiye Yaakkobu Avalaich Serndhaan.
5 pilgaal Karppavadhiyaagi, Yaakkobukku Oru Kumaaranaip Petraal.
6 appozhudhu Raagel: Dhevan En Vazhakkaith Theerththu, En Saththaththaiyum Kettu, Enakku Oru Kumaaranaik Koduththaar Endru Solli, Avanukkuth Thaan Endru Perittaal.
7 marupadiyum Raagelin Velaikkaariyaagiya Pilgaal Karppavadhiyaagi, Yaakkobukku Irandaam Kumaaranaip Petraal.
8 appozhudhu Raagel: Naan Magaa Poraattamaai En Sagodhariyode Poraadi Merkonden Endru Solli, Avanukku Napthali Endru Perittaal.
9 leyaal Thaan Pillaiperugiradhu Nindruponadhaik Kandu, Than Velaikkaariyaagiya Silpaalai Azhaiththu, Avalai Yaakkobukku Manaiviyaagak Koduththaal.
10 leyaalin Velaikkaariyaagiya Silpaal Yaakkobukku Oru Kumaaranaip Petraal.
11 appozhudhu Leyaal: Eraalamaagiradhendru Solli, Avanukkuk Kaadh Endru Perittaal.
12 pinbu Leyaalin Velaikkaariyaagiya Silpaal Yaakkobukku Irandaam Kumaaranaip Petraal.
13 appozhudhu Leyaal: Naan Baakkiyavadhi, Sdhireegal Ennaip Baakkiyavadhi Enbaargal Endru Solli, Avanukku Aaser Endru Perittaal.

14 kodhumai Aruppu Naatkalile Roopan Vayalveliyile Poi, Thoodhaayeem Kanigalaik Kandeduththu, Avaigalaik Konduvandhu Than Thaayaagiya Leyaalidaththil Koduththaan. Appozhudhu Raagel Leyaalai Nokki: Un Kumaaranudaiya Thoodhaayeem Kaniyil Enakkuk Konjam Thaa Endraal.

15 adharku Aval: Nee En Purushanai Eduththukkondadhu Arpakaariyamaa? En Kumaaranudaiya Thoodhaayeem Kanigalaiyum Eduththukkollavendumo Endraal; Adharku Raagel: Un Kumaaranudaiya Thoodhaayeem Kanigalukku Eedaaga Indru Iravu Avar Unnode Sayanikkattum Endraal.

16 saayangaalaththil Yaakkobu Veliyilirundhu Varugaiyil Leyaal Purappattu Avanukku Edhirkondupoi: En Kumaaranudaiya Thoodhaayeem Kanigalaal Ummaik Konden; Aagaiyaal, Neer Ennidaththil Varavendum Endraal; Avan Andru Iravu Avalode Sayaniththaan.
17 dhevan Leyaalukkuch Sevikoduththaar. Aval Karppavadhiyaagi Yaakkobukku Aindhaam Kumaaranaip Petraal.
18 appozhudhu Leyaal: Naan En Velaikkaariyai En Purushanukkuk Koduththa Palanaith Dhevan Enakkuth Thandhaar Endru Solli, Avanukku Isakkaar Endru Perittaal.
19 appuram Leyaal Karppavadhiyaagi Yaakkobukku Aaraam Kumaaranaip Petraal.

20 appozhudhu Leyaal: Dhevan Enakku Nalla Eevaith Thandhaar; En Purushanukku Naan Aaru Kumaararaip Petrapadiyaal, Ippozhudhu Avar Ennudane Vaasampannuvaar Endru Solli, Avanukkuch Sepulon Endru Perittaal.
21 pinbu Aval Oru Kumaaraththiyaiyum Petru, Avalukku Dheenaal Endru Perittaal.
22 dhevan Raagelai Ninaiththarulinaar; Avalukkuth Dhevan Sevikoduththu, Aval Karppandharikkumpadi Seydhaar.
23  Aval Karppavadhiyaagi Oru Kumaaranaip Petru: Dhevan En Nindhaiyai Neekkivittaar Endrum,
24  Innum Oru Kumaaranaik Karththar Enakkuth Tharuvaar Endrum Solli, Avanukku Yoseppu Endru Perittaal.
25  Raagel Yoseppaip Petrapin, Yaakkobu Laabaanai Nokki: Naan En Sthaanaththirkum En Dhesaththirkum Poga Ennai Anuppividum.
26 naan Umakku Oozhiyanjeydhu Sampaadhiththa En Manaivigalaiyum En Pillaigalaiyum Enakkuth Thaarum; Naan Poven, Naan Ummidaththil Seviththa Sevagaththai Neer Arindhirukkireer Endraan.
27 appozhudhu Laabaan: Un Kangalil Enakkuth Dhayavu Kidaiththadheyaanaal Nee Iru; Un Nimiththam Karththar Ennai Aaseervadhiththaar Endru Kurippinaal Arindhen.
28 un Sambalam Innadhendru Enakkuch Sol, Naan Adhaith Tharuven Endraan.
29 adharku Avan: Naan Ummaich Seviththa Vidhamum, Ummudaiya Mandhai Ennidaththil Irundha Vidhamum Arindhirukkireer.

30 naan Varumunne Umakku Irundhadhu Konjam; Naan Vandhapin Karththar Ummai Aaseervadhiththadhinaal Adhu Migavum Perugiyirukkiradhu; Ini Naan En Kudumpaththukkuch Sambaaththiyampannuvadhu Eppozhudhu Endraan.
31 adharku Avan: Naan Unakku Enna Tharavendum Endraan; Yaakkobu: Neer Enakku Ondrum Tharavendiyadhillai; Naan Sollukirapadi Neer Enakkuch Seydhaal, Ummudaiya Mandhaiyaith Thirumpa Meyththuk Kaappen.

32 naan Indraikkup Poi, Ummudaiya Mandhaigalaiyellaam Paarvaiyittu, Avaigalil Pulliyum Variyum Karuppumulla Semmariyaadugalaiyum, Variyum Pulliyumulla Vellaadugalaiyum Piriththuvidugiren; Appadippattavai Ini Enakkuch Sambalamaayirukkattum.

33 appadiye Inimel En Sambalamaagiya Ivatrai Neer Paarvaiyidumpodhu, En Needhi Vilangum; Pulliyum Variyumillaadha Vellaadugalum, Karuppaana Semmariyaadugalum En Vasaththil Irundhaal, Avaiyellaam Ennaal Thirudikkollappattavaigalaai Ennappadattum Endraan.
34 adharku Laabaan: Nee Sonnapadiye Aagattum Endru Solli,

35 annaalile Kalappu Niramum Variyumulla Vellaattuk Kadaakgalaiyum, Pulliyum Variyumulla Vellaadugal Yaavaiyum, Satru Venmaiyum Karumaiyumulla Semmariyaadugal Yaavaiyum Piriththu, Than Kumaararidaththil Oppuviththu,
36 thanakkum Yaakkobukkum Idaiyile Moondrunaal Pirayaana Thooraththil Irukkumpadi Vaiththaan. Laabaanudaiya Matra Aadugalai Yaakkobu Meyththaan.
37 pinbu Yaakkobu Pachchaiyaayirukkira Punnai, Vaadhumai, Armon Ennum Marangalin Koppugalai Vetti, Idaiyidaiye Venmai Thondrumpadi, Pattaiyai Uriththu,
38 thaan Uriththa Koppugalai Aadugal Thanneer Kudikka Varum Kaalvaaigalilum Thottigalilum Aadugalukku Edhiraagap Pottuvaippaan; Aadugal Thanneer Kutikka Varumpodhu Polivadhundu.
39 aadugal Andhak Koppugalukku Munbaagap Polindhapadiyaal, Avaigal Kalappu Niramulladhum Pulliyulladhum Variyulladhumaana Kuttigalaip Pottadhu.

40 andha Aattukkuttigalai Yaakkobu Piriththukkondu, Aadugalai Laabaanudaiya Mandhaiyilirukkum Kalappuniramaanavaigalukkum Karuppaanavaigalellaavatrirkum Edhiraaga Niruththi, Than Aadugalai Laabaanudaiya Mandhaiyode Serkkaamal, Thanippuramaaga Vaiththukkolvaan.
41 balaththa Aadugal Poliyumpodhu, Andhak Koppugalukku Edhire Poliyumpadi Yaakkobu Avaigalai Andha Aadugalin Kangalukku Munbaagak Kaalvaaigalile Pottuvaippaan.
42  Balaveenamaana Aadugal Poliyumpodhu, Avaigalaip Podaamaliruppaan; Idhanaal Balaveenamaanavaigal Laabaanaiyum, Balamullavaigal Yaakkobaiyum Serndhana.
43 ivvidhamaai Andhap Purushan Migavum Viruththiyadaindhu, Thiralaana Aadugalum, Velaikkaarigalum, Velaikkaararum, Ottagangalum, Kazhudhaigalum Udaiyavanaanaan.
